response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's worth an incredible $15,000 to you, and we're eager to share its benefits with you. After careful consideration, we propose to sell this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also maximizing our return on investment. We believe this price reflects the quality and potential impact of our product on your life or business. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.", "product_price": 14000}
